name: Jewel Match IV
storyline: You have returned to the college of magic but they have a problem. There are numerous magical gems on the college grounds because of an experiment that a former researcher did. Now, those gems are running out. You need to find this researcher and learn what he did to create these magical gems.
summary: Jewel Match IV is a match-three game with thew occasional hidden object levels and puzzles. To make matches, swap two tiles to create a row of three or more of the same tile in a horizontal or vertical line. To clear most levels, you must make matches over gold tiles to remove them. Later, you will encounter unpolished tiles that must be matched twice to clear them. Each level has more than one board and most board are wider than the screen, requiring you to scroll to see everything. As you progress, items will hinder you like chains, fog and boxes. You will have assistance from other wizards with things like breaking groups of chains or temporarily clearing fog so you can see what gems are there. After a couple levels, when you match four items together, you create a rainbow gem that can be matched with any two gems that are the same color. When you match five gems, you create a helix that can clear an entire horizontal row.
